column1: '''Stanley P. Baldwin''' (born [[1942]]) is a writer and teacher, currently living in Nebraska. He is a frequent contributor to scholarly series as [[wikipedia:SparkNotes
column2: SparkNotes]] and [[Cliffs Notes on Tolkien's The Lord of the Rings and The Hobbit
column4: Beowulf]]'' and many others in the latter series, and [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] in the former.
